trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of groups within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer samling av grupper i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the ListViewGroupCollection associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å hente ListViewGroupCollection som er tilknyttet en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This collection contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> objects that represent the groups shown in the control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen inneholder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>objekter som representerer gruppene som vises i kontrollen når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen settes til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}".
trans-unit.target: Alle elementer som ikke er tilordnet til en gruppe vises i standardgruppen som har hodet etiketten "DefaultGroup {0}".

trans-unit.source: The default group is not contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection, and cannot be altered.
trans-unit.target: Standardgruppen finnes ikke i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling, og kan ikke endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups.
trans-unit.target: Det er primært nyttige ved feilsøking for å sikre at alle elementer har lagt riktig til grupper.

trans-unit.source: If there are no groups in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection, the grouping feature is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen grupper i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling, grupperingsfunksjonen er deaktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method to add a single group to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>metode for å legge til en enkelt gruppe i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A> method to add a group at a particular index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A>metode for å legge til en gruppe i en bestemt indeks i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove a group, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne en gruppe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove the group at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metode for å fjerne gruppen i et bestemt indeksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection more than once.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke legge til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>i samlingen flere ganger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: To reposition a group within the collection, it must first be removed from the collection, and then inserted at the desired location.
trans-unit.target: For å flytte en gruppe i samlingen, må den først være fjernes fra samlingen, og deretter inn på ønsket plassering.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>metode for å finne ut om en bestemt gruppe er allerede i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of a group within the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente indeksen for en gruppe i samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get or set the group at a particular index with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Item%2A> indexer.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente eller angi gruppen i et bestemt indeksen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Item%2A>indeksering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add multiple groups to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>metode for å legge til flere grupper i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple groups either as an array of groups or as a ListViewGroupCollection that you retrieve through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til flere grupper som en matrise av grupper eller en ListViewGroupCollection du hente via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en annen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>metode for å fjerne alle grupper fra samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> methods remove groups from the collection, but do not remove any items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>metoder fjerne grupper fra samlingen, men ikke fjerne alle elementene fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there are no groups in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection, the grouping feature is disabled and all items in the control are displayed normally.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen grupper i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling, grupperingsfunksjonen er deaktivert, og alle elementer i kontrollen skal vises vanligvis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> methods are useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>metodene er nyttig når du vil angi flere måter å gruppere elementene i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do this, create multiple group arrays.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du opprette flere gruppen matriser.

trans-unit.source: To change the grouping, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the next array of groups to display.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre grupperingen, må du først bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>metode for å fjerne alle grupper fra samlingen, og bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>metode for å legge til neste rekke grupper som skal vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the groups in a collection to a compatible array starting at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.CopyTo%2A>metode for å kopiere gruppene i en samling til en kompatibel matrise som starter ved en angitt indeks.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig, for eksempel når du vil sortere gruppene i samlingen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kopiere gruppene til en kompatibel matrise, og deretter matrisen.

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the sorted array back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Deretter bruker de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>metode for å fjerne alle grupper fra samlingen, og bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>metode for å legge sorterte matrisen i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A> property to determine how many groups are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A>til å fastslå hvor mange grupper som finnes i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: To iterate through the collection, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gå gjennom samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>returnert fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The grouping feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Grupperingsfunksjonen er bare tilgjengelig på Windows XP og Windows Server 2003 familien når programmet kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups will be ignored and the groups will not appear.
trans-unit.target: Gruppene vises ikke på eldre operativsystemer kode knyttet til grupper ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet kanskje kode som er avhenger av Grupperingsfunksjonen fungerer ikke riktig.

trans-unit.source: You might want to include a test that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vil ta med en test som bestemmer om grupperingsfunksjonen er tilgjengelig, og oppgi alternative funksjonalitet når den er utilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi alternativ sortering når du kjører på operativsystemene som ikke støtter sortering av gruppen.

trans-unit.source: > > The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: >> Innsetting merke funksjonen er angitt av samme bibliotek med funksjonen for oppsett av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Undersøk tilgjengeligheten av dette biblioteket ved kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>overlasten for metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å legge til en eksisterende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection more than once.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke legge til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>i samlingen flere ganger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: When you call the Add method using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> that is already in the collection, the addition fails and -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller Add-metode ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>som er allerede i samlingen, i tillegg mislykkes og returneres -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: To add multiple groups to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til flere grupper i samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> å legge til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the group within the collection, or -1 if the group is already present in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for gruppe i samlingen, eller -1 Hvis gruppen finnes allerede i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: group contains at least one that belongs to a control other than the one that owns this .
trans-unit.target: groupinneholder minst én som hører til en kontroll enn den som eier dette .

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to the collection using the specified values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header*> properties
trans-unit.target: Legger til en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> i samlingen med de angitte verdiene initialisere den <> </> *> og <> </> *> egenskaper

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name*> property for the new group.
trans-unit.target: Startverdien for de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name*>-egenskapen for den nye gruppen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header*> property for the new group.
trans-unit.target: Startverdien for de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header*>-egenskapen for den nye gruppen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of groups to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en matrise av grupper i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this version of the AddRange method to add an array of groups to the group collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne versjonen av metoden AddRange til å legge til en matrise av grupper i gruppe-samling.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you create multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> objects and want to add them to the collection with a single method call.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig når du oppretter flere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>objekter og ønsker å legge dem til i samlingen med et enkelt metodekall.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: To add individual groups to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til individuelle grupper i samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er også nyttig når du vil angi flere måter å gruppere elementene i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To do this, create multiple group arrays.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du opprette flere gruppen matriser.

trans-unit.source: To change the grouping, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the AddRange method to add a different array of groups.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre grupperingen, må du først bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>metode for å fjerne alle grupper fra samlingen deretter bruke AddRange-metoden til å legge til en annen matrise gruppesett.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method, the AddRange method does not have a return value that can be used to determine whether a group being added is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>metoden metoden AddRange ikke har en returverdi kan brukes til å finne ut om en gruppe som legges til, er allerede i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need this information, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A> method before using the AddRange method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger denne informasjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>metoden før du bruker metoden AddRange.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> that specifies the groups to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> som angir grupper som skal legges til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: groups contains at least one group with at least one that belongs to a control other than the one that owns this .
trans-unit.target: groupsinneholder minst én gruppe med minst én som hører til en kontroll enn den som eier dette .

trans-unit.source: Adds the groups in an existing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til gruppene i en eksisterende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"> </xref> i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection> that you retrieve through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruke denne versjonen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>metode for å legge til elementer i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection>som du hente via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen til en annen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method does not have a return value that can be used to determine whether a group being added is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>-metoden i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>metoden har ikke en returverdi kan brukes til å finne ut om en gruppe som legges til, er allerede i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need this information, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A> method before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger denne informasjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>metoden før du bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref> containing the groups to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"> </xref> som inneholder grupper som skal legges til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: groups contains at least one group with at least one that belongs to a control other than the one that owns this .
trans-unit.target: groupsinneholder minst én gruppe med minst én som hører til en kontroll enn den som eier dette .

trans-unit.source: Removes all groups from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle grupper fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all the groups from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne for å fjerne alle grupper fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Note that removing groups from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection does not remove items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at å fjerne grupper fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen ikke fjerner elementer fra de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to disable the grouping feature.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig å deaktivere grupperingsfunksjonen.

trans-unit.source: When there are no groups in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, the items appear normally.
trans-unit.target: Når det er ingen grupper i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere elementene vises som normalt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To remove individual groups from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne individuelle grupper fra samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er også nyttig når du ønsker flere måter å gruppere elementene.

trans-unit.source: To change the grouping, first use the Clear method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add a different array of groups.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre grupperingen først Bruk Fjern for å fjerne alle grupper fra samlingen, og bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>metode for å legge til en annen matrise gruppesett.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified group is located in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte gruppen finnes i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection more than once.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke legge til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>i samlingen flere ganger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: However, attempting to add another copy will not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid vil prøver å legge til et nytt eksemplar ikke Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the addition will simply fail.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg mislykkes i stedet ganske enkelt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method will return a value of –1 in this case.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>metoden tilbakestiller verdien -1 i dette tilfellet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A> methods, however, do not have return values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A>metoder, men ikke har returverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: When adding groups using one of these methods, use the Contains method to determine whether a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til grupper ved hjelp av en av disse metodene, kan du bruke Contains-metode for å fastslå om en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>finnes allerede i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> ikke i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the group is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gruppen er i samlingen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the groups in the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Overfører gruppene i samlingen til en kompatibel endimensjonal <xref:System.Array>, med Start fra den angitte indeksen på Målmatrisen.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the groups in a collection (including the item references they contain) to a compatible array, starting at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden CopyTo for å kopiere gruppene i en samling (inkludert rapportelementreferanser de inneholder) til en kompatibel matrise som starter ved en angitt indeks.

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig, for eksempel når du vil sortere gruppene i samlingen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kopiere gruppene til en kompatibel matrise, og deretter matrisen.

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the sorted array back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Deretter bruker de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>metode for å fjerne alle grupper fra samlingen, og bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>metode for å legge sorterte matrisen i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> to which the groups are copied.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Array>til gruppene kopieres.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The first index within the array to which the groups are copied.
trans-unit.target: Den første indeksen i matrisen gruppene kopieres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall grupper i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the number of groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å fastsette antall grupper i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you need to loop through the collection and perform the same operation on each group.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du trenger å gå gjennom samlingen og utføre den samme operasjonen på hver gruppe.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>metode for å gå gjennom samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The number of groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Antall grupper i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en opplisting som brukes til å gå gjennom samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you need to iterate through the collection to perform the same operation on each group.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig når du skal gå gjennom samlingen til å utføre samme operasjon på hver gruppe.

trans-unit.source: You can also loop through the collection once for each group, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of loops.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også gå gjennom samlingen én gang for hver gruppe, ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A>til å fastslå hvor mange løkker.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that represents the collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>som representerer samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer indeksen for den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine the index of a group within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å fastslå indeksen for en gruppe i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, to determine the index of each group when you iterate through the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig, for eksempel til å bestemme indeksen for hver gruppe når du gå gjennom samlingen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> ikke i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the group within the collection, or -1 if the group is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for gruppe i samlingen, eller -1 Hvis gruppen ikke er i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> i samlingen i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> at a particular index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å sette inn en eksisterende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>på en bestemt indeks i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection more than once.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke legge til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>i samlingen flere ganger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: When you call the Insert method using a group that is already in the collection, the insertion simply fails.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller metoden Insert med en gruppe som er allerede i samlingen, mislykkes ganske enkelt innsetting.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A> method before the insertion to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>metoden før innsetting å finne ut om en bestemt gruppe er allerede i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: To reposition a group within the collection, you must first remove it, and then insert it at the desired index.
trans-unit.target: For å flytte en gruppe i samlingen, må du først fjerne det og sett deretter inn på ønsket indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The index within the collection at which to insert the group.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i samlingen som skal settes inn i gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> å sette inn i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> i den angitte indeksen i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve the group at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å hente gruppen i den angitte indeksen i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: When you have a reference to the group object and need the index, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når du har en referanse til Gruppeobjektet og må indeksen, bruker du den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index within the collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i samlingen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> ikke hente eller angi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> i den angitte indeksen i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to .
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn 0 eller større enn eller lik .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> med angitt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapsverdi.

trans-unit.source: The name of the group to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på gruppen for å hente eller angi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> with the specified name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no such <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> exists.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> med det angitte navnet eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det finnes ingen slik <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> finnes.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove a group from the collection when you have a reference to the group.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å fjerne en gruppe fra samlingen når du har en referanse til gruppen.

trans-unit.source: Note that removing a group from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection does not remove items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Merk at hvis du fjerner en gruppe fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen ikke fjerner elementer fra de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To remove a group at a particular index, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne en gruppe i en bestemt indeksen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>metoden i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove all the groups from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne alle grupper fra samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> skal fjernes fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> i den angitte indeksen i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove a group from the collection when you have the index of the group within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å fjerne en gruppe fra samlingen når du har indeksen for gruppe i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Note that removing groups from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection does not remove items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at å fjerne grupper fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen ikke fjerner elementer fra de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To remove a group using a reference to the object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne en gruppe med en referanse til objektet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>metoden i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove all the groups from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne alle grupper fra samlingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Når du fjerner et element fra samlingen, endre indeksene for etterfølgende elementer i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: All information about the removed item is deleted.
trans-unit.target: All informasjon om fjernes elementet er slettet.

trans-unit.source: The index within the collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i samlingen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilgang til samlingen synkroniseres (tråden trygt).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som kan brukes til å synkronisere tilgang til samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The object used to synchronize the collection.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som ble brukt til å synkronisere samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> has been added.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> er lagt til.

trans-unit.target: valueis not a .

trans-unit.source: -or- value contains at least one that belongs to a control other than the one that owns this .
trans-unit.target: - eller - value inneholder minst én som hører til en kontroll enn den som eier dette .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified value is located in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte verdien finnes i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> ikke i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: if value is a contained in the collection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis value er en befinner seg i samlingen; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: Returns the index within the collection of the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer indeksen i samlingen av den angitte verdien.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to find in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to find in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of value if it is in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for value hvis den er i samlingen; ellers, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>, it is not added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `value` er ikke en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>, den ikke legges til i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: The position at which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen der de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> er lagt til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> å legge til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om samlingen har en fast størrelse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om samlingen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> i den angitte indeksen i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet ikke hente eller angi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> that represents the item located at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> som representerer elementet finnes i den angitte indeksen i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> fjerne fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"> </xref>.
